content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving two parties referred to as houses the case number is 34422022 the text explains that the plaintiff has incurred costs totaling €443000 and €45000 which the estate is responsible for the text covers a period of one year and three months from july 14 2021 to october 4 2022 it mentions the open successions of two individuals l and p di c without providing further details the text assigns various properties including real estate and apartments to the parties involved it also assigns an amount of money to the heirs the purpose of the text is to divide the assets in a fair and proportional way in an inheritance case the court has been involved and has made a final ruling with the costs of the litigation to be borne by the estate
